modName: ALEXSTRASZA - (MxR's Nord Female) - UPDATED CHARGEN PRESET
descriptionHtml:
[center]Alexstrasza Preset[/center]

[center]I decided to make this mod because I personally liked Alexstrasza's appearance and the other save was heavily outdated.[/center]
[center][size=3][color=#CC0000]R[/color][color=#BB1100]e[/color][color=#AA2200]q[/color][color=#993300]u[/color][color=#884400]i[/color][color=#775400]r[/color][color=#666600]e[/color][color=#557600]m[/color][color=#448800]e[/color][color=#339900]n[/color][color=#22A900]t[/color][color=#11BB00]s[/color][/size]
CharGEN Extenstion
Apachii Hair
Coverwoman (OPTIONAL)
Covereyes
SKSE
Racemenu[/center]


[center]Q: Where do I put the file?
A: In /SKSE/PLUGINS/CHARGEN/PRESETS

Q: I don't have that directory. Help?
A: Go into your game, open the console (~ [tilde] key) and type "showracemenu" without the ". Now find "Preset Slot", drag it to a number you want to save it under ,and hit F5, it should create a CHARGEN folder in your plugins.

Q: I have a different question.
A: Leave it in the comments. :)

CREDIT
Bethesda for creating Skyrim

MrLenski for Coverwomen & Covereyes

and of course...
[url='https://www.youtube.com/user/MMOxReview']MMOXREVIEW[/url]Â for originally making Alexstrasza in Skyrim![/center]
author: SirOlek
